original: Contribution to $PLOTTER$'s plot to $PLOT$ less than §Y$POWER$%§!\n
Contribution to $PLOTTER$'s plot to $PLOT$ at least §Y$POWER$%§!\n
$WHO$ is made the First Spouse of $SPOUSE$.\n
$WHO$ is no longer the First Spouse of $SPOUSE$.\n
Can be dismissed if the following is true:\n
translation: 具备下列条件就可以解散：\n

original: Must have a special revoke reason if we have a Truce
translation: 因为有和约在身，所以必须有一个特殊的剥夺理由

original: Since you have a valid reason, no one will care.
translation: 因为你在理，没有人会反对。

original: We do not need to bother with just causes - might makes right! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can invade the lands of §Y$TARGET$§!. If successful, the titles to all currently occupied holdings will be seized and all vassals will become our vassals.
translation: 我们不用为找借口而困扰——强权即真理！§Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以入侵§Y$TARGET$§!的土地。如果成功的话将获得所有占领地上的头衔，并且附庸原有的所有封臣。

original: We do not need to bother with just causes - might makes right! §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can invade the lands of §Y$TARGET$§!.
translation: 我们不用为找借口而困扰——强权即真理！§Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以入侵§Y$TARGET$§!的土地。

original: Food tasters have the dubious pleasure of trying all dishes before their master has a bite...
translation: 试毒者对所有的菜品在领主还没咬上一口就能尝到的事情有着莫名的兴趣……

original: Islamic suspicion of figurative art makes skilled calligraphers highly respected.
translation: 伊斯兰对具象艺术的猜忌使得书法家大受尊敬。

original: The Court Musician is always ready to entertain with soothing or stirring music.
translation: 宫廷乐师时刻准备着抚拨乐器待客。

original: Islamic poets enjoy a great deal of respect and prestige, often religious, but sometimes pushing the limits of what is acceptable under Islam.
translation: 伊斯兰诗人享有极高的声誉和威望，经常创作宗教主题的作品，但有时也会挑战伊斯兰社会接受程度的界限。

original: The Chief Architect is responsible for designing and overseeing the construction of palaces, mosques and grand monuments.
translation: 首席建筑师负责设计和督建宫殿、清真寺和大纪念碑。

original: The Chief Qadi is the supreme judge and authority of the Law (Sharia) in the realm. The most prestigious of all Muslim honorary titles, it is only open to characters with a proper religious education.
translation: 首席卡迪是境内最高法官与伊斯兰法权威。是穆斯林所有荣誉头衔中最具威望的。它只授予受过良好宗教教育的人。

original: Dwarves are objects of fascination and curiosity. Having one at court is a matter of prestige.
translation: 侏儒是魅力与新奇的代名词。宫廷里是否有一个侏儒事关威望与荣誉。

original: This character is a veteran of a Jihad.
This character has made the Hajj - the pilgrimage to Mecca.
This character is on a pilgrimage to Mecca.
translation: 此人正在前往麦加朝圣的路上。

original: This character is formally schooled in Islamic jurisprudence.
translation: 此人受过正规的伊斯兰教法的训练。

original: This character has completely memorized the Qur'an.
translation: 此人能背诵整本古兰经。

original: This character is patrilineally descended from the Prophet Muhammad's uncles al-Abbas and Abu Talib, or from the sons of his daughter Fatimah - Hasan ibn Ali and Husain ibn Ali.
translation: 此人乃是先知穆罕默德的叔伯们阿拔斯和阿布·塔利卜，或者他女儿法蒂玛的儿子们哈桑·伊本·阿里和侯塞因·伊本·阿里的父系后裔。

original: The mother of this character is a Sayyida (patrilineally descended from the Prophet Muhammad).
translation: 此人的母亲是赛义达（先知穆罕默德的父系后裔）。

original: Old wounds have left this character visibly scarred.
translation: 此人身上可见旧伤的疤痕。

original: The character has completed a great pilgrimage.
translation: 此人完成过一次伟大的朝圣。

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is my Spouse and higher ranked

translation: 不允许扮演§Y出身卑微§!的角色
§Y$PLAYER$§!不允许扮演§Y出身卑微§!的角色

original: This character has proven to be a capable commander when leading light infantry into battle.
translation: 此人已证明自己是个合格的轻步兵指挥官。

original: This character is skilled at leading heavily armored infantry into battle.
translation: 此人善于指挥重装步兵作战。

original: This character excels at leading men to war on horseback.
translation: 此人擅长带领骑兵作战。

original: This character has a way of reaching directly into the hearts and minds of the soldiers on the battlefield, and not just with a sword.
translation: 此人在战场上鼓励士兵很有一套。

original: This character is known to be an unpredictable element on the battlefield. The enemy won't see it coming, and neither will you!
translation: 此人长于误导敌军，经常声东击西。

original: This character is a skillful organizer in matters of logistics and in overcoming the challenges of moving a large body of men from one point to another.
translation: 此人精于兵力和物资输送。

original: This character has a reputation as a stalwart defender, standing like a stone wall alongside the men no matter what force hurls itself against them.
translation: 此人在战斗中无论承受何种打击都像石墙般屹立。

original: This character fights best when positioned on the flank of an army, striking deeply at the chinks in the enemy's armor.
translation: 此人最好被部署在侧翼，直接撕入敌军深处。

original: This character does not shy away from battle, and will show no mercy to opponents who attempt to quit the field.
translation: 此人从不怯战，对企图逃走的敌人也从不手下留情。

original: The cough disappeared, thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! I still feel a bit weak but the coughing, the chest pain and the shortness of breath are gone.
translation: 咳嗽消失了，感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！我仍然觉得有点虚弱，但是咳嗽胸痛和气喘都已经消失了。

original: Your father sinned when he fathered you
translation: 你爸生下你就是个错误

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] help us when that [Root.Liege.GetLadLass] sits on the throne...
By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], ye shan't leave this field alive.
By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], what have I gotten myself into? I will have no part in this madness.
translation: 我的[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]啊，我都干了点啥？我不会再参与到这场疯狂中去。

original:
I assume this is yet another poor attempt at humor, my liege. I shan't surrender that which is rightfully mine, no matter who demands it, by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我看这不过是又一个低劣的玩笑，大人。不论是谁提的要求，我都不会放弃本应属于我的东西，以[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has choosen the weapon for the duel: a forkful of animal excrement
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]已选好了决斗武器：一叉子动物排泄物

original: I could not believe my ears when [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s second told me what kind of weapon we would use in the duel: a forkful of animal excrement!
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]的副手告诉我我们的决斗武器是什么时，我简直无法相信自己的耳朵：一叉子动物排泄物！

original: I will not touch animal excrement!
translation: 我不会去碰动物排泄物！

original: It came as no suprise to me when [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s second told me to bring my sword to the duel, I was just glad I didn't have to fight with a sledgehammer, or, [Root.Religion.GetName] forbide, something disgusting as animal excrement!
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]的副手告诉我带上我的剑去决斗时，我一点也没感到意外。我很高兴我不需要拿个大锤子，或者，[Root.Religion.GetName]请恕我无罪，一些恶心的东西，比如动物排泄物！

original: The Mongol scourge has poured through the Golden Gates of Kiev and sacked the once proud trading hub. The city has been left a smoldering ruin and the Dnieper now runs red with the blood of its former inhabitants.
translation: 蒙古之灾涌入了基辅的金门，洗劫了这个曾经兴盛的贸易中心。城市只剩下冒烟的废墟，第聂伯河的河水现在被它先前居民的鲜血染红。
蒙古人洗劫了诺夫哥罗德！

original: Novgorod has been stormed by the Tartar horde and both the city and its population are now suffering beyond measure. The Cathedral of Saint Sophia is engulfed in flames as the steppe warriors loot that which can be carried away and put the rest to the torch.
translation: 诺夫哥罗德被鞑靼部落所席卷，这座巨城和它的人民正蒙受着无法估量的损失。草原战士们搬走了所有可以搬走的东西后，将圣索菲亚主教座堂付之一炬。

original: Perhaps their bloodlust has been sated now.
translation: 或许他们的嗜血现在得到了满足。
蒙古人洗劫了克拉科夫！

original: The Mongols continue their push beyond the Vistula and into Poland. Krakow has now fallen to the invaders, and it is said that at night the flames from the burning city can be seen from untold leagues away.
translation: 蒙古人继续进军，越过维斯瓦河并攻入波兰。克拉科夫现已落入侵略者之手，据说方圆百里都可见夜空被城市的大火映如白昼。

original: Even Aachen, the former seat of Charlemagne's great Carolingian empire, has fallen under the shadow of the Mongol scourge. His spirit must surely be weeping at the atrocities now being committed within the city's walls.
translation: 即使是亚琛，查理曼伟大的加洛林帝国前御座所在，也已落入蒙古之灾的阴影之中。他的灵魂无疑在为城墙内正发生的暴行而哭泣。

original: Like a swarm of locusts, the unstoppable Mongols have descended upon Paris and sacked the city. The still unfinished Notre Dame Cathedral is quickly set on fire and with the light provided by the rest of the burning city, the Mongol warriors can continue looting and murdering well into the night.
translation: 犹如蝗灾过境，不可阻挡的蒙古人攻陷了巴黎并洗劫了这座城市。尚未竣工的巴黎圣母院就如火海中的明烛，和燃烧的城市一起见证着日以继夜的抢掠和杀戮。

original: There seems to be no reprieve from these accursed Tartars.
translation: 这群被诅咒的鞑靼人不会得到任何宽恕。

original: Not even the sea has proved a formidable enough barrier to halt the Mongol advance. London has fallen to their vanguard and the city is now the scene of a slaughter on a scale unrivaled since the days of Queen Boudica and her rebellion.
translation: 即使海洋也算不上是能阻止蒙古人推进的屏障。伦敦已落入贼手。 城内上演着自布狄卡女王的起义以来都未曾见过的屠杀。

original: Once more Rome suffers at the cruel hands of eastern barbarians. The Mongols have breached the Aurelian Walls, and their horses are now grazing on the field of the Circus Maximus while they raise their yurts on the Palatine Hill. As expected, no mercy is shown to those Romans who have not yet fled the city.
translation: 罗马再一次遭受了东方蛮族的残酷欺凌。蒙古人突破了奥勒良墙，正牧马于马克西姆斯竞技场，立寨于帕拉蒂尼山上。一如所料，对未来得及逃离的罗马民众他们没有展示出任何怜悯。

original: Is this the end of days?

The canals of Venice have been blocked by the bloated corpses of the dead as the city is sacked by frenzied Mongol warriors. Those few fortunate enough to have escaped the slaughter claim the bodies are packed tightly enough in the Venetian Lagoon for the Mongols to ride to and from the mainland as they please.
translation: 丧心病狂的蒙古人洗劫了威尼斯，威尼斯的城市运河被尸体所淤塞。少数足够幸运得逃出屠杀的人声称，蒙古人用尸体将威尼斯潟湖填实以能在大陆与城市间任意驰骋。
蒙古人洗劫了君士坦丁堡！

original: The Theodosian Walls have not been enough to spare Constantinople from the vile touch of the Tartar scourge. The great imperial capital has been sacked, its citizens butchered or enslaved, the Hagia Sophia defiled and the Great Palace of the emperors put to the torch.
translation: 坚固的狄奥多西墙并未能使君士坦丁堡逃脱鞑靼之鞭的卑污魔爪。这座传奇之城——色雷斯明珠已被洗劫，其子民或遭屠杀，或沦为奴隶，圣索菲亚大教堂惨遭亵渎，连富丽堂皇的皇宫也被付之一炬。

original: May God have mercy on their souls.

The Mongols have now reached as far west as Lisbon in their conquests. While the city burns at their touch, the steppe warriors look out over the great blue expanse of the Atlantic. Who can tell where they will turn next?
translation: 蒙古人已经将他们的征服扩展到了西至里斯本的地域。在这城市被点燃后，这些草原战士们将目光投向了蔚蓝的大西洋。谁又知道他们的下一个目标是哪呢？

original: Is there no place beyond their reach?
translation: 就没有地方是他们到不了的吗？
蒙古人洗劫了斯摩棱斯克！

original: Smolensk has been swallowed up by the Mongol hordes as they continue their relentless advance to the west. When the great host finally moves on, little remains of the city but ashes and charred rubble, and those lucky few inhabitants who somehow escaped the notice of the rampaging horsemen.
translation: 斯模棱斯克已被蒙古大军毫无怜悯的西征吞噬。兵锋过处，只余灰烬和残垣，间或逃过屠杀的幸存者于废墟间苟延残喘。

original: Such butchery will not go unpunished.
translation: 这些屠夫不会逃脱惩罚的。

original: The city of Prague has become a beacon of light in an otherwise dark world, as the Mongol barbarians move from house to house and set fire to everything not yet looted. A flood of refugees spread horrific tales about the cruelty of the bloodthirsty Tartar horsemen to every corner of Europe.
translation: 蒙古蛮子们挨家挨户抢掠烧杀，布拉格熊熊燃烧犹如黑夜中的灯塔。难民潮将这些嗜血鞑靼骑兵的残忍恐怖的故事传向欧洲的每个角落。

original: Have they no regard for culture?
translation: 他们对文明就没有一点敬意？

original: Vienna, a city of growing importance on the Danube river, has become the latest victim of the Mongol hordes as they continue to pillage and burn their way across Europe. The smoking ruins and arrow-riddled corpses they leave behind when they move on do not lend much faith in the city's future prospects.
translation: 维也纳，多瑙河上的璀璨明珠，成为了蒙古部落在欧洲一路烧掠的最新牺牲品。冒烟的废墟，插满箭簇的尸体，让人对这个城市的未来不抱期望。

original: There will come a time of reckoning.

translation: 蒙古人洗劫了艾斯特根！

original: The Mongols have reached beyond the Carpathians and fanned out across the Great Hungarian Plain. Now the city of Esztergom has fallen to the murderous host and is the scene of indiscriminate slaughter. Those that attempt to flee on foot are cut down without mercy by the fast horsemen as dark, billowing smoke rises towards the sky above the city.
translation: 蒙古人越过喀尔巴阡山，穿过匈牙利大平原。艾斯特根已陷嗜杀者之手，无差别的屠杀在这里上演。骑马的恶灵追砍着任何企图逃跑的人，滚滚浓烟直冲云霄像是在为之呐喊。

original: May it be the last city the Tartars take!
translation: 但愿这是鞑靼人攻陷的最后城市！

original: The ancient city of Athens has fallen to the Mongols, and they now rampage unchecked behind its walls. Great monuments and artifacts dating back to the dawn of Western Civilisation are lost forever in a cultural desecration that will surely be felt by future generations thousands of years from now.
translation: 古老的雅典城已陷入蒙古人之手，如今他们在城墙后肆无忌惮地横冲直撞。追溯至西方文明黎明时期的不朽纪念碑和其他古迹一同毁灭，这些野蛮人对文化的亵渎必遭后人千年的唾骂。

original: This time they have gone too far!
translation: 这次他们做得太过分了！
蒙古人洗劫了贝尔格莱德！

original: The "White City" has turned red as the Mongol invaders seize Belgrade and massacre the inhabitants without exception. After several days of slaughter and looting, the smell of death and rotting flesh proves too much even for the Mongols to bear and they move their camp upwind from the scorched ruins of the city.
translation: 在蒙古入侵者攻克贝尔格莱德后无差别地屠杀居民之下，这座「白城」已经变成了红色。经过数日的屠杀和劫掠，尸体和腐肉的臭味已经让蒙古人自己都无法忍受。他们移营到了已成焦土的城市的上风处。

original: They will be the end of us all!
translation: 他们会是我们所有人的末日！

original: Rally support amongst the vassals of [This.Holder.GetTitledName] in an attempt to fabricate a claim on the [This.GetFullBaseName]. God willing, you may some day become their new liege.
translation: 争取[This.Holder.GetTitledName]众封臣们的支持以伪造对[This.GetFullBaseName]的宣称权。一切顺利的话，你将如愿成为他们的领主。

original: Put the plot into motion by attempting to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].
Put the plot into motion by attempting to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].
Rally support amongst the other vassals of [This.Holder.GetTitledName] in an attempt to fabricate a claim on the [This.GetFullBaseName]. God willing, you may some day become their new liege.
translation: 争取[This.Holder.GetTitledName]治下同僚们的支持以伪造对[This.GetFullBaseName]的宣称权。一切顺利的话，你将如愿取代你的领主。

original: Put the plot into motion by attempting to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].
Put the plot into motion by attempting to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].

Rally support amongst the other vassals of [This.Holder.Liege.GetTitledName] in an attempt to fabricate a claim on the [This.GetFullBaseName]. God willing, you may some day rightfully take the title from [This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 争取[This.Holder.Liege.GetTitledName]其他封臣们的支持以伪造对[This.GetFullBaseName]的宣称权。一切顺利的话，你将合法夺取[This.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]的头衔。

original: Put the plot into motion by attempting to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].
Put the plot into motion by attempting to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].
With the aid of your fellow conspirators, you have managed to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].
translation: 在共谋者的帮助下，你成功地伪造了[Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName]的宣称。

original: Not only have you failed to fabricate a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName], but your efforts have been discovered. [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is none too pleased...
translation: 你未能成功伪造对[Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName]的宣称权，更糟糕的是走漏了风声。[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]大发雷霆……
小型古腾塔克民兵营地
大型古腾塔克民兵营地
巨型古腾塔克民兵营地
任何可能的部落伯爵领
所有可能的部落伯爵领

original: Our Imperial administration allows us to revoke Duchies without objections from the aristocracy.
translation: 我们的帝国行政法允许我们剥夺公爵头衔而不引起贵族的反对。

original: You are already married, remember? To [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]?

translation: 碾过自家散兵进行冲锋

original: Tasting the forbidden wine of Hedonism
Change due to combat this month
translation: 本月由战斗引起的变化
§Y由无职的儿子们引起的变化：§!

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war on §Y$TARGET$§! with several strong claims (weak claims do not count.)
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!对§Y$TARGET$§!有几个强宣称可用来宣战（不包括弱宣称）

original: The following Weak Claims can be pressed:\n$LIST$
Has a Decadence of at least
Dear $SPOUSE$, our marriage just is not working anymore. Therefore, §Y$REL_HEAD$§! has graciously granted us a divorce.\n\n$ACTOR$
translation: 亲爱的$SPOUSE$，我们的婚姻已经走到了尽头。§Y$REL_HEAD$§!已仁慈地同意我们离婚。\n\n$ACTOR$

original: Dear $SPOUSE$, our marriage just is not working anymore. Therefore, I have decided to divorce you. Sorry.\n\n$ACTOR$
translation: 亲爱的$SPOUSE$，我们的婚姻已经走到了尽头。因此，我决定和你离婚。见谅。\n\n$ACTOR$

original: Destroying this title would cost you §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige. All de jure vassals of the $TITLE$ will be upset (§R$OPINION$§! Opinion).
translation: 销毁这个头衔会消耗你 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望。所有$TITLE$头衔下的法理封臣都会感到失望（§R$OPINION$§! 好感）。
不能销毁伯爵和男爵头衔

original: Is NOT being contested by claimants
translation: 不在被别的宣称者挑战中

original: On succession, Strong Claims are only given to children who are second or third in the line of succession.
translation: 当该头衔被继承的时候，只有第二第三顺位继承人才能得到该头衔的强宣称。

original: Does NOT have a Strong Claim on $TITLE$
Does NOT have a Weak Claim on $TITLE$
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has nothing but contempt for [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s idiotic flagellation
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[This.GetTitledFirstName]的白痴的鞭打行为只表示鄙视

original: The [Root.Culture.GetName] populace in [Root.GetName] have embraced [Root.Holder.Culture.GetName] culture.

The [Root.Culture.GetName] populace in [Root.GetName] resent me as a ruler and feel that I am a foreigner, yet I depend on these selfsame people to collect my taxes and man my army. This simply will not do. I think it is time to bring some boys from back home over to help out here.
translation: [Root.GetName]的[Root.Culture.GetName]民众认为我是个外国人并憎恨我，然而我还要靠同一批人的来当兵纳粮。这显然不行。我看是时候从老家找点人过来帮忙了。

original: My roots may be [Root.Culture.GetName], but I identify more with the [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] people I rule.
translation: 我的根或许是[Root.Culture.GetName]人，但是我更认同我统治下的[Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]人。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has adopted the foreign ways of [From.Capital.GetName], behaving more like a petty [From.Capital.Culture.GetName] burgher than a proper [Root.Culture.GetName] lord.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经改行[From.Capital.GetName]的外国做派，举止更像一个[From.Capital.Culture.GetName]小民，而不是一个[Root.Culture.GetName]君主。

original: died at the hands of the Hashshashin
Committed Zina (sexual intercourse with other man/woman than spouse)
Averted my eyes from the sins of others
Grateful for the Court Calligrapher's good work
translation: 对宫廷书法家的优秀作品非常满意

original: Let all who profess martial ability be invited

§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has decided it is time for §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! to depart this world. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.GetPossPronoun] backers will look for opportunities to kill §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! - the higher the Plot Power, the more likely they are to find openings.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!决定是时候让§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!离开人世了。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!和[From.GetPossPronoun]支持者将寻找机会谋杀§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!——阴谋参与度越高，他们找到机会的可能性就越高。

original: Seeing [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] with [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] nose deep in the cup, it suddenly struck me that all I need to get rid of [Root.PlotTarget.GetObjectPronoun] is a fine poison...
translation: 看到[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]连[Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun]鼻子都探入杯中，我突然想到一个念头：清除[Root.PlotTarget.GetObjectPronoun]，仅需一剂好的毒药……

original: Hemlock goes well with the Red...
Too expensive - I will bide my time
translation: 太贵了——我还是继续等待时机吧

original: Poison [This.GetTitledName] at the feast next month
translation: 在下个月的宴会上毒杀[This.GetTitledName]

original: Suddenly, it hit me - poison! Surely the safest way to get rid of troublesome... pests.
translation: 突然，我想到了一个绝佳的点子——毒药！这是清除那些烦人的……害虫的最安全的方法。

original: Ask the Plot head for funds
Tell [This.GetTitledName] of the idea to kill [This.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]
My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], is asking for funds to poison [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] at an upcoming banquet...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，正在寻求资助，用以下次宴会时毒杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]……

original: Very well - too bad I will not see it!
translation: 很好——可惜我不能亲眼看到这一幕！

original: Even [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] death is not worth it.
translation: 就算是[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]死也不值这花费。

original: Inform [This.GetTitledName] that I will not pay
[From.GetTitledName] has sent me the necessary funds to poison [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]...
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经把毒杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]所需资金拨付给了我……

original: [From.GetTitledName] has refused to fund the rare poison needed to off [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: [From.GetTitledName]拒绝资助购买清除[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]所需的珍稀毒药。

original: I will pay for it myself!
What a merry feast, surrounded by my friends and loved ones... I feel a thirst coming on. Page, more wine!
translation: 多么怡人的宴会，亲朋好友环聚……我想多喝几杯。侍者，倒酒！

original: Poison! My body is growing numb, but as my sight fades, I die loudly cursing my killer's name!
translation: 有毒！我的身体逐渐麻木，但在我失去知觉之前，我吼出了凶手的名字！

original: Poison! My body is growing numb. Someone, please help me! [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]...
translation: 有毒！我的身体逐渐麻木。来人，救救我！[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]……

original: Poisoned wine? How cliché. These amateurs will be brought to justice!
translation: 毒酒？这么老套的手法？这些外行将被绳之以法！

original: I could feel Death breathing down my neck... Who would want me dead?
translation: 我能感到死亡的气息正顺着我的喉咙而下……是谁想要我死？

original: I fear I shall never know
My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has let me know that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will die by poisoned wine at an upcoming banquet...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，告诉我[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]将会在即将到来的宴会上被毒死……

original: [From.GetTitledName] approves of my idea to poison [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]同意了我毒杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的点子。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]原谅我！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. [From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap] will die by poisoned wine at a feast in one month.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我谋杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的阴谋进展顺利。[From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap]将在一个月内的宴会上被毒杀。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledName] died of the poisoned wine. Unfortunately, my complicity was discovered.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledName]死于毒酒。不幸的是，我的同谋被发现了。

original: Success! It seems the wine did not agree with [From.GetTitledName]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] died not knowing the name of [From.GetPossPronoun] killer.
translation: 成功了！看来酒也跟[From.GetTitledName]作对。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]死时完全不知道[From.GetPossPronoun]凶手的名字。

original: I think I will celebrate with... beer.
translation: 我想我可以用……啤酒来庆祝。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledName] did not drink the wine and my complicity was discovered.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledName]没有喝下毒酒，我的同谋也被发现了。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledName] did not drink the wine, but was unable to uncover the conspiracy.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledName]没有喝下毒酒，不过也没能发现我的同谋。

original: We will just have to try again
Seeing the cook's son fall from a tree, I had a flash of inspiration. Children are such foolish and clumsy creatures - how tragic if [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] were to fall off the parapets...
translation: 看到厨师的儿子从树上掉下来，我灵光一闪。儿童是多么愚蠢和无能的生物啊——如果[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]从护栏上摔下来那会是多悲剧……
我的同谋应该认识一些人……

original: I know the perfect man for the job!
translation: 我知道最适合干这活的人！

original: Ah, children, how they hurt themselves. How rare to see one without a bruise, a bump or a scab. Hmm, what if someone were to take a rather long fall?
translation: 啊，儿童，他们多么容易伤到自己。要看到一个没有瘀斑、疙瘩或者结疤的是多么困难啊。嗯，如果有人来一次高处跌落会怎样呢？

original: Ask the Plot head for funds
My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], is asking for funds to arrange a tragic falling accident for [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Certain retainers need to be bribed...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，正寻求资助，用来给[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]制造一次悲剧的跌落事故。需要收买一些家臣……

original: [From.GetTitledName] has sent me enough money to bribe someone to give [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] a gentle push off the parapets.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]给我了足够的金钱来收买某人带给[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]翻落护栏的温柔一推。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has refused to give me the necessary bribes to have [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] fall off the parapets.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]拒绝给我收买所必需的钱来让[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]翻落护栏。

original: I love the thrill of heights, running on the castle walls and looking down at the little people below. If I reach out, maybe I can reach that bird's nest...
translation: 我喜欢高处的刺激，在城墙上奔跑，看着底下的小人儿。如果我探出去点，也许我能够到那个鸟窝……

original: AAAH, someone pushed me! I'm falling! NOOO!
translation: 啊啊啊啊啊，有人推我！我掉下去了！不——！

original: He was going to push me! I will find out who bribed him and why!
translation: 他想推我！我会找出谁收买了他，还有这么做的理由！

original: Was that scullery maid going to push me off the wall? Who would want me dead?
translation: 那个洗碗侍女想推我下去？是谁想要我死？
我想我可能永远不会知道……

original: Good news! My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has let me know that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will soon have a tragic fall off the castle parapets...
translation: 好消息！我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，告诉我[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]不久将会悲剧地从城堡护栏上摔下去……

original: [From.GetTitledName] approves of my scheme to push [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] of a wall. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]同意了我把[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]推下墙的计划。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]宽恕我！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. [From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap] will soon fall off the castle walls. Such tragedy!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我谋杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的阴谋进展顺利。[From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap]不久将从城墙上摔下去。真是悲剧！

original: Success! [From.GetTitledName] flew off those walls like an ostrich! Unfortunately, the assassin was caught and my complicity was discovered.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledName]像鸵鸟一样飞下了墙！不幸的是，刺客被抓住了，我的同谋也被发现了。

original: Success! It seems little [From.GetTitledName] had not yet learned how to fly. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] died a quick and presumably painless death.
translation: 成功了！看来小[From.GetTitledName]还没有学会怎么飞翔。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]死得很干脆。

original: Chicken for lunch today, I think
Failure! [From.GetTitledName] dodged the assassin and ran off. My complicity was discovered.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledName]闪开刺客跑了。我的同谋被发现了。

original: Failure! The hired assassin did not get a chance to push [From.GetTitledName] off the walls, and will likely not get another. At least the plot remains unknown...
translation: 失败了！雇佣的刺客没找到把[From.GetTitledName]推下墙的机会，而且似乎也找不到更多的机会了。好在这个阴谋还没被发现……

original: This option is available due to your high §YDiplomacy§! skill
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你高超的§Y外交§!技能

original: This option is available due to your high §YMartial§! skill
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你高超的§Y军事§!技能

original: This option is available due to your high §YStewardship§! skill
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你高超的§Y管理§!技能

original: This option is available due to your high §YIntrigue§! skill
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你高超的§Y阴谋§!技能

original: This option is available due to your high §YLearning§! skill
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你高超的§Y学习§!技能

original: This option is available because you have the §Y$TRAITNAME$§! trait
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y$TRAITNAME$§!特质

original:
§YCombat Modifier§!
This modifies any flank led by this character
translation:
§Y战斗修正§!
修正此人率领军队的两翼

original: The voices are whispering to me, telling me what to do... horrible, horrible things they want me to do... I have gained the §YLunatic§! trait.
translation: 这些声音对我低语，让我去做什么……可怕的，他们让我去做可怕的事……我获得了§Y精神错乱§!特质。

original: The Venetian merchant Marco Polo has finally returned to Europe after many years of travel in the Far East with his father and uncle. An account of their journey has been published as "The Travels of Marco Polo," describing, among other things, the distant lands of Cathay and Manji. Readers are provided a rare glimpse of the world beyond Europe, but there are those who discount the entire chronicle as a fabrication...
translation: 经过了数年和父亲与叔父在远东的游历，威尼斯商人马可波罗终于回到了欧洲。旅程的记录被写成一本叫《马可波罗游记》的书出版了。书里描绘了遥远土地上的契丹国和蛮子国，给读者们提供了欧洲以外世界的惊鸿一瞥，但是也有人认为整个故事是捏造的……
不管怎么说，这都是个惊艳的故事！

original: A great fleet from the distant lands of China has appeared in the Arabian Sea. Commanded by the eunuch explorer Zheng He, or Hajji Mahmud Shamsuddin as he is known in Arabic, the fleet's colossal treasure ships are of a size never before seen in these waters. Despite its formidable strength, the expedition does not seem bent on conquest and will soon depart to explore other lands.
translation: 一支来自远方东土的庞大舰队出现在了阿拉伯海。舰队由宦官郑和率领，他在阿拉伯世界以哈儿只·马哈茂德·赡思丁之名为人所知晓。舰队惊人的宝船尺寸在这片水域前所未见。尽管实力无可匹敌，这支考察船队却似乎并没有征服的打算，并将在不久后前往探索别的地方。

original: The great city of Baghdad, one of the world's foremost centers of learning, has succumbed to the ravenous Mongol hordes after a siege. Nothing can sate their appetite for destruction it seems. The Tigris river runs not only red with blood, but black with the ink of priceless and irreplaceable tomes from the House of Wisdom and the city's other great libraries.
translation: 伟大的城市巴格达，全世界最重要的学识中心之一，在围城后被饥饿的蒙古部落吞噬。似乎没有什么可以满足他们的毁灭欲。底格里斯河不光被鲜血所染红，还被来自智慧之家与城内其他大图书馆的无价和不可替代的巨著的墨水所染黑。

original: Let us pray the Mongols are swallowed up by the desert now.
translation: 让我们祈祷蒙古人被沙漠吞噬。
蒙古人洗劫了大马士革！

original: Damascus, the ancient City of Jasmine, has been sacked by the advancing Mongols. They have gathered a colossal pile of severed heads on a field just outside the city walls, now renamed "burj al-ru'us" by the massacre's few survivors - the Tower of Heads.
translation: 大马士革，这座茉莉古城，被推进的蒙古人洗劫。我们的战士已经在城墙外的空地上用斩下的头颅堆积起一座巨大的小山，现在大屠杀为数不多的幸存者称之为 burj al-ru'us——断头之塔。

original: May they suffer a thousand deaths for their crimes!
translation: 愿他们得到千倍的惩罚！

original: It will fall on those of the True Faith to stop the Tartar scourge.
translation: 只有真正的信仰才能阻止这场鞑靼灾祸。
蒙古人洗劫了耶路撒冷！

original: The Tartar infidels have sacked Jerusalem, spurring a moment of rare solidarity between members of all the city's different religions as they suffer equal horrors under the cruel yoke of the pagans.
translation: 鞑靼异教徒洗劫了耶路撒冷，让城里不同宗教的人罕见地团结起来，因为他们都面临着被原始宗教徒奴役的恐怖。
蒙古人洗劫了亚历山大！

original: Not content with their vast empire surpassing Alexander the Great's in sheer size, the Mongol hordes are now laying waste to the city that is his namesake as well. Pompey's Pillar has been toppled, but at least the Pharos Lighthouse is spared when the Mongols deem it not worth the great effort it would require to raze it to the ground.
translation: 蒙古铁骑并不满足于他们的巨大帝国已经在纯粹的面积上超越了亚历山大帝国，他们现在正在劫掠这座以大帝之名命名的城市。庞培柱被推倒，但还好亚历山大灯塔幸存了下来，因为蒙古人认为费力把它夷平并不值当。

original: May they suffer an eternity of pain!
Would that I could follow in Alexander's footsteps...
translation: 或许我可以沿着亚历山大的脚步……

original: Riding through the fertile Nile Delta, the Tartar hordes have arrived at the Great Pyramids of Giza and breached the gates of Cairo. Surely even the cruelest Pharaoh would be given pause by the pain and misery now inflicted on the city's hapless population.
translation: 在肥沃的尼罗河三角洲一路劫掠，鞑靼大军已兵临吉萨金字塔，踏破开罗城。很显然，即便是最残忍的法老也会被开罗不幸民众的痛苦和无助所震撼。

original: But who is left to tax?

The Holy City of Mecca now burns at the cruel touch of the Mongol infidels. Pilgrims journeying from distant lands to show their submission to Allah are met only with death when approaching the city gates. This unforgivable desecration will be remembered for ages to come.
translation: 圣城麦加焚毁于蒙古异教徒无情的火把之下。远方为向安拉表示虔诚而来的朝圣者们在靠近城门时只能遭遇死亡。未来无数的世代将记住这不可饶恕的亵渎。

original: Not a single infidel taking part in this affront will escape justice
translation: 没有任何一个参与这次亵渎的异教徒能逍遥法外

original: God forbid this scourge continues west...
translation: 神啊阻止这场灾难向西蔓延吧……

original: They will not come here, Inshallah
translation: 他们不会来这里的，安拉保佑

original: May the snows of the frozen north claim them
translation: 愿北方的冰雪惩罚他们

original: These horsemen know how to fight!
translation: 这些骑手懂得如何作战！

original: Their walls were not strong enough...
Not even the Franks deserve such a fate
translation: 就是法兰克人也不该遭遇这样的命运

original: So not even fabled Rome can stand against them
translation: 即使传说中的罗马也无法阻挡他们

original: Ar-Rum is no longer a threat...
translation: 东罗马不再是一个威胁了……
他们的触角似乎不可阻挡……

original: Is this what we can expect?
translation: 这就是我们今后的下场吗？
这些抽大麻的瘾君子人畜无害……

original: The Hashshashin, the elusive Order of Assassins, have expanded their influence into Syria. A branch of their sect has established itself in the mountain fortress of Masyaf, from where they control the surrounding countryside. All across the Holy Land, the Assassins are now hunting those they see as obstacles to their obscure plans...
translation: 阿萨辛派，这个神鬼莫测的刺客组织，将他们的势力范围扩展到了叙利亚。他们在山中要塞迈斯亚夫建立了一个分支，并以此为据点控制周围地区。刺客们在整个圣地猎杀那些他们视为阻碍自己的密谋的人……
阿萨辛扩展到了叙利亚

original: Perhaps these Hashshashin should be taken seriously...
translation: 或许该严肃对待阿萨辛派了……

original: With the fall of their last fortress, the Hashshashin - the notorious Assassin Order - has been scattered to the winds. The few remaining members of the order have gone into hiding, biding their time in the vain hope that they will one day be able to resume their work.
translation: 随着最后一个据点的陷落，阿萨辛派——臭名昭著的刺客组织——已在风中消散。少数残党隐姓埋名，苟延残喘，幻想着某天还能东山再起。

original: The Hashshashin have returned! Somehow, throughout the years, their surviving members have managed to rebuild a measure of their order's former strength. Striking from the shadows, they have retaken one of their old mountain fortresses and now their trained killers are once again hounding those who would act against their interests...
translation: 阿萨辛派又回来了！通过种种方法，它的残党在这些年里成功地恢复了这个组织昔日的荣光。从暗影中出击，他们夺回了他们的一个旧日据点。现在他们训练有素的杀手再次开始猎杀与他们有利益冲突的人……

original: Surely they wouldn't dare strike at me.
translation: 他们肯定不敢拿我怎么样。

original: The Hashshashin are no more. As their fortresses and mountain hideouts burn, the last members of the once feared Assassin Order are hunted like animals and cut down without mercy or compassion when found. Their legacy now survives only in the legends and stories spawned from their exploits.
translation: 阿萨辛派已经彻底消失了。随着堡垒的熊熊大火，一个个阿萨辛的余孽们如动物般被冷酷屠宰。他们唯一的遗物，便是那些关于阿萨辛的传说了。

original: The word is spreading like wildfire across the lands of the East! Members of the Hashshashin have killed the great warlord [From.GetTitledName]. They stabbed him at his camp in full view of his men, and though the assassins outlived the [From.GetTitle] by only a few seconds, their mission was accomplished. His men swear vengeance against the Assassin Order!
translation: 流言如野火般在东方的大地上传播开来！阿萨辛派刺杀了大领主[From.GetTitledName]。在他的营地里，在众目睽睽之下，他们将匕首刺入了他的胸膛，尽管这些刺客们只比[From.GetTitle]多活了不过几秒钟，他们还是完成了任务。他的部下宣誓要对阿萨辛进行复仇！

original: Not even the dreaded Hashshashin have been able to give pause to the Mongols in their bid to conquer the world. Several of their members have been killed in a failed attempt on the life of [From.GetTitledName]. He and his men now swear revenge against the hated Order of Assassins.
translation: 即便是可怕的阿萨辛派也没能使蒙古人征服世界的步伐停下一步。他们的一些成员在刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的行动中失败被处死。他和他的部下现在发誓要对可憎的阿萨辛教派发起复仇。

original: You wake suddenly in cold sweat with a strong sensation that something is amiss. The flickering candlelight in your tent reveals a plate of hot biscuits and a note pinned by a poisoned dagger next to your bed. It reads: "Mend your decadent ways before it is too late, [Root.GetFirstName]. The Hashshashin are watching."
translation: 你带着一身冷汗突然醒来，一个强烈的感觉告诉你有些事不对劲。帐篷里摇曳的烛光下，可见一盘热饼干和一把插在床边的匕首。匕首抹了毒，上面还插着一张纸条：「改过自新，为时未晚，[Root.GetFirstName]。阿萨辛派在看着你。」

original: Perhaps the time for change has come...

Master, terrible news! Your faithful servant, [From.GetTitledName], has been found dead in [From.GetHerHis] home, no doubt at the hands of the vile Hashshashin. Carved by knife into [From.GetHerHis] chest were the words: "[Root.GetFirstName] - You were warned."
translation: 主公，大事不好！你忠实的仆人，[From.GetTitledName]，被发现死在了[From.GetHerHis]家里，无疑这出自卑鄙的阿萨辛派之手。插入[From.GetHerHis]胸膛的匕首上有留言：「[Root.GetFirstName]——我们警告过你了。」

original: As you turn a street corner in [Root.Location.GetName], a strange whistling sound swishes past your ear. Your bodyguards topple over, knives in their throats, and before you can react you are surrounded by robed Hashshashin. Their leader approaches you with a sad look on his face. "May you find what you seek in the life hereafter, friend."
translation: 正当你在[Root.Location.GetName]转过一个街角的时候，一个奇怪的哨声在你耳边响起。你的亲卫翻倒在地，脖子上都插着匕首。你还没来得及反应，就发现一群穿斗篷的阿萨辛派围住了自己。他们的首领走了出来，脸上带着一副悲哀的神情。「愿您在身后能找到您所追寻的，朋友。」

original: But... but I am not ready!

[From.GetTitledName] staggers past your guards, bleeding profusely from a dozen stab-wounds. As [From.GetSheHe] collapses in a pool of blood at your feet, [From.GetSheHe] gasps with [From.GetHerHis] last breath: "The H-Hashshashin..."
translation: [From.GetTitledName]踉跄地穿过你的亲卫，鲜血从十几处刀伤中喷涌而出。在[From.GetSheHe]倒在你脚下的血泊中时，[From.GetSheHe]喘出了[From.GetHerHis]最后一口气：「阿 - 阿萨辛派……」

original: Your guards bring in a covered basket left just outside your palace. Believing it to be confections from one of your subjects, you hungrily pull away the covering blanket only to reveal the severed, gaping head of [From.GetTitledName]. The mark of the Hashshashin has been carved into the forehead.
translation: 卫士带进来一个遗留在宫外的盖住的篮子。你以为这是某个下属送来的甜点，兴冲冲地打开了盖子，却发现了[From.GetTitledName]那满脸狰狞，被戳了几个窟窿的人头。前额上，刻了一个阿萨辛派的标记。

original: I think I've lost my appetite...

As you stroll through your palace garden with [From.GetTitledFirstName], you see the brief glint of reflected sunlight on metal as a thrown dagger flashes past and buries itself in your friend's throat. Your bodyguards rush you to safety, but you glimpse a robed assassin scurrying over the palace walls...
translation: 当你和[From.GetTitledFirstName]在宫内花园里游玩时，你看到一道阳光闪过，一把飞刀闪耀着埋入了你朋友的咽喉。你的卫兵迅速地将你带离至安全之地，但你还是瞥见了宫墙上穿梭着的一个穿着斗篷的刺客……

original: The Hashshashin! Was I the intended target?
translation: 阿萨辛派！他们的目标是我吗？

original: You wake suddenly in cold sweat with a strong sensation that something is amiss. The flickering candlelight in your tent reveals a plate of hot biscuits and a note pinned by a poisoned dagger next to your bed. It reads: "There are a thousand ways to kill a [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName]. The Hashshashin know them all."
translation: 你带着一身冷汗突然醒来，一个强烈的感觉告诉你有些事不对劲。帐篷里摇曳的烛光下，可见一盘热饼干和一把插在床边的匕首。匕首抹了毒，上面还插着一张纸条：「有一千种方法可以杀掉一个[Root.GetManWoman]，[Root.GetFirstName]。而阿萨辛派每个都知道。」

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is due to tour [Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName] in an open carriage to receive the accolades and adulation of the common folk. There is bound be an escort, but what if a few archers were placed on the [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitle]'s path on certain key rooftops...
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]近期计划访问[Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName]，坐敞篷马车接受民众的欢呼和赞誉。肯定会有大量的亲兵护卫，但是如果在[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitle]必经之路的关键屋顶上埋伏几名弓手会发生什么呢……

original: My co-conspirators will find some good men...
translation: 我的同谋会找到一些能人……

original: I know just the men for this job...

My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has asked for coin to hire some bowmen to ambush [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] as [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] tours [Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName] in an open carriage...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，要求我给一些钱来雇佣几个弓手，用以在[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的[Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName]敞篷马车游上伏击[Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me sufficient coin to hire some skilled archers to greet [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] with as [From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] tours the streets of [Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给了我足够的钱来雇佣一些箭术高手，在[From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]游览[Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName]街道时给[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]带去问候。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to grant me the coin necessary to hire skilled bowmen to skewer [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝给我雇佣箭术高手来射穿[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]所必需的钱。

original: I decided to tour [Root.Location.GetName] to receive the adulation of my subjects, but as my open carriage took a turn past the scroll depository I suddenly heard the whizzing sound of an arrow flying past mere inches from my head.
translation: 我决定到[Root.Location.GetName]去接受属下们的爱戴，但是正当我的敞篷车拐过一个仓库时，我突然头顶一凉，听见了飞箭破空的声音。

original: My God. They're going to kill us all!
translation: 天哪。他们想把我们所有人都杀死！

original: Did that come from the grassy knoll?
Ambush [This.GetTitledFirstName] with an arrow barrage next month.

I have been caught in a deadly crossfire! One of the arrows digs into my shoulder, and as I struggle to remove it, the final blow is delivered - an arrow strikes my temple, and my head is thrown back and to the left...
translation: 我被致命的交叉火力袭击了！一枝箭钉入了我的肩膀，正当我挣扎着要取出它时，遭到了最后一击——一枝箭击中了我的太阳穴，我的头随着它狠狠地向后甩了一下，然后无力地向左耷拉了下去……

original: This was no lone bowman. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] orchestrated this!
translation: 这不可能是偶发事件。肯定是[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]精心策划的！

original: My carriage was bombarded with arrows, but thanks to what must surely have been the intervention of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I miraculously emerged unscathed!
translation: 我的马车被箭雨覆盖了，但是[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]保佑，我奇迹般地毫发无伤！

original: Who were those bowmen working for?
I have received word from my co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], that the bowmen are in place and waiting for the right moment to strike at [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我从同谋[From.GetTitledFirstName]那得到消息，弓箭手已就位，坐等时机击杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my plan to ambush [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] with archers from the rooftops of [From.PlotTarget.Location.GetName]. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意了我的让弓箭手从[From.PlotTarget.Location.GetName]的屋顶上伏击[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的计划。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]原谅我！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is proceeding well. [From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap] will soon be skewered by arrows while touring [From.PlotTarget.Location.GetName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋进展顺利。[From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap]不久将在[From.PlotTarget.Location.GetName]游玩时被利箭射穿。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was caught in a deadly arrow crossfire between the scroll depository and a grassy knoll. Unfortunately, the scapegoat we had arranged to take the blame spilled my name.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在仓库和草丘间被致命的交叉箭雨所覆盖。糟糕的是，我们安排的替罪羊说漏了我的名字。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was caught in a deadly arrow crossfire between the scroll depository and a grassy knoll. The story we concocted about a "lone bowman" seems to be working perfectly.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在仓库和草丘间被致命的交叉箭雨所覆盖。我们杜撰的「独行箭手」的故事效果很好。

original: One less threat to the establishment.
Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] escaped the arrow barrage unharmed, and one of the captured bowmen revealed my name.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]毫发无伤地逃脱了箭雨，而一个被抓获的弓手更是吐出了我的名字。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] escaped the arrow barrage unharmed, but at least all of the hired bowmen made a quiet escape and the conspiracy remains uncovered.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]毫发无伤地逃脱了箭雨，好在所有的雇佣弓手都悄然逃离了现场，我们的阴谋依然无人知晓。

original: Watching the animal pens outside [Root.Location.GetName] gave me an idea in how to deal with [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Concentrated manure can be a very explosive substance, and if enough is gathered in a single place and ignited, the blast could prove lethal...
translation: 望着[Root.Location.GetName]外面的畜栏，我有了一个对付[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的主意。浓缩粪肥可以变成极具威力的爆炸物，如果收集到足够多的量堆到一个位置然后点燃，爆炸将非常致命……

original: My co-conspirators will procure the necessary manure...
translation: 我的同谋会搜罗到足够的粪肥……

original: I know a farmer who has what I need...
translation: 我认识一个农民有我要的东西……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has asked for coin to buy copious amounts of explosive manure with which to blow [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] sky high.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，要求我给他点钱来购买大量的有爆炸力的粪肥以便把[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]炸上天。

original: It might just be crazy enough to work...
translation: 也许这个疯狂的计划可以实现吧……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has provided the money I need to procure enough manure to see to the end of [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]提供了我需要的钱来搜集足够的粪肥，好看到[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的末日……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to provide enough money to procure the manure needed for an explosion, calling it a "hare-brained scheme."
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝提供足够的钱来搜集制造一次爆炸所需的粪肥，还说这是一个「轻率的的计划」。

original: Riding through the countryside together with my escort, I come upon a lonely inn. It is empty aside from a nervous-looking innkeeper who nevertheless promises food and wine at a very reasonable price. My party and I sit down at a table.
translation: 我跟护卫们一起在郊外骑马，来到了一家孤零零的小旅馆。这个小旅馆里除了一个面色紧张的店主以外什么人都没有，不过食物和酒的价格还是颇为公道。于是我们纷纷落座。

original: Innkeeper! Bring us the best you have to offer!
translation: 掌柜的！把你们店里最好的给我呈上来！

original: By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], what is that infernal smell?!
translation: 我的[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，这股地狱的味道是咋回事？！

original: Prepare manure to blow [This.GetTitledFirstName] into the heavens next month.
translation: 为下个月把[This.GetTitledFirstName]炸上天准备粪肥。

original: Soon after the innkeeper disappears into the kitchen, we notice a foul odor emanating from somewhere below the floorboards. One of my escort pulls open a loose board to reveal... a massive manure pit. Before we can react further to this bizarre find, the floor explodes beneath my feet...
translation: 店主退下到厨房不久后，我们注意到地板下什么东西正在发出恶臭。一个护卫掀开了一块较松的木板发现……一个巨大的粪堆。在我们还没能就这个惊异的发现做出进一步的举动前，地板在我脚下炸了开来……

original: My guards detain the innkeeper and pull open the floorboards to reveal a massive pit of manure beneath the inn. The innkeeper confesses to having been paid to ignite the manure once we were seated, blowing everyone to kingdom come.
translation: 卫兵们扣押了店主并掀开了地板，发现旅馆下面有一个大粪堆。店主认罪说他被收买了，有人指使在我们落座时点燃那个粪堆，好把所有人都炸上西天。

original: So this was the work of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]...

My guards detain the innkeeper and pull open the floorboards to reveal a massive pit of manure beneath the inn. The innkeeper confesses to having been paid to ignite the manure once we were seated, blowing everyone to kingdom come, but his employer concealed his or her identity.
translation: 卫兵们扣押了店主并掀开了地板，发现旅馆下面有一个大粪堆。店主认罪说他被收买了，有人指使在我们落座时点燃那个粪堆，好把所有人都炸上西天，但是他的雇主隐瞒了自己的身份。

original: Perhaps this wretch was working alone. Off with his head!
translation: 或许这个可怜虫只是自己单干的。砍了他！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], my co-conspirator, has sent word that a massive pit of manure has been prepared under the floorboards of an abandoned inn on a path [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will travel with [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] escort. Once they are seated at a table...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]，我的同谋，通知我说那一大堆粪肥已经被安置在[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]和[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]护卫出行必经路上的一个废弃旅店的地板下面。一旦他们落座……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my plan to blow [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] sky high with copious amounts of manure. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意了我用大量粪肥把[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]炸上天的计划。但愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]能原谅我！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] informs me that [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will soon perish. A pit of manure has been prepared under the floorboards of an abandoned inn where [From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] will soon be dining. A single spark will send our little problem kingdom come...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]通知我说[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]不久将殒命。一堆粪肥已经被安置在了[From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]不久将用餐的废弃旅店的地板下面。一个火花就能让我们的小麻烦上西天……

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] perished in the manure explosion! Unfortunately, the farmer who provided the manure revealed my name...
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]死于粪堆爆炸！糟糕的是，提供粪肥的农民泄露了我的名字……

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] perished in the manure explosion! There is no trace of my complicity to be found amongst the rubble.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]死于粪堆爆炸！瓦砾之下，没人能发现我们参与其中。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] discovered the manure and avoided the explosion. My complicity was revealed.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现了粪堆躲过了爆炸。我的同谋被发现了。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] discovered the manure and avoided the explosion. Thankfully, my role in this remains unknown...
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现了粪堆躲过了爆炸。幸运的是，我在这次阴谋中扮演的角色依然无人知晓……

original: If that whelp [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is to die, we will need to buy the loyalty of someone unscrupulous nearby, like a maid or a guard.
translation: 如果要让那个崽子[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]死掉，我们需要买通他身边的人，比如一个侍女或护卫之类的。

original: My co-conspirators will procure the necessary funds...
translation: 我的同谋会筹集必需的资金……

original: I know who we can approach...

My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has requested funds to buy the loyalty of a serving maid close to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. She will see to it that the child ceases to be a problem... ceases to be altogether, in fact.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，请求资助收买一个[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的贴身女佣。她会让这孩子不再成为问题……两个都不再，实际上。

original: I cannot think of a more worthy cause. Send the money!
translation: 我想不出更好的点子了。付钱！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has given me the coin I need to bribe one of the serving maids working near [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给了我收买[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]身边侍女所需要的钱。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] will not give me the coin I need to bribe one of the serving maids working near [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝给我收买[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]身边侍女所需要的钱。

original: As you lie in your crib, staring up at the ceiling and contemplating your future exploits, an adult enters the room. You recognize her as one of the maids, but this time there is something very cold and distant in her eyes. She approaches you with a pillow in her hands...
translation: 当你躺卧在你那小小的儿童床上，凝望着天花板，盘算着自己未来的功绩时，你突然发现有个大人走进了你的房间。你认识她，她是你的一位随身侍女中。但是，你发现她的目光是那么的冰冷、那么的漠然，冷漠得让人毛骨悚然。她手中拿着一个枕头，慢慢地向你走了过来……

original: Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to be murdered next month.
The maid puts the pillow over your face and the world grows dark. With luck perhaps you will be reborn in a gentler era...
translation: 侍女用枕头蒙住了你的脸，整个世界都暗了下来。幸运的话，或许能重生在一个和谐点的时代吧……

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had my short life cut shorter!
Who put her up to this?

As the maid draws near, you take a deep breath and produce a piercing wail that echoes through the nearby hallways. The startled maid drops the pillow and runs away before someone comes to investigate.
translation: 在侍女走近时，你深深地吸了一口气，迸发出一阵尖利的嚎叫，在周围的房间里回响、吓到了的侍女扔下枕头，在别人进来询问之前逃之夭夭了。

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has managed to get to one of the maids near [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. For a princely sum, she has agreed to solve our little problem for us.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，成功地搞定了[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]身边的一个侍女。看在钱的份上，她同意解决我们的小问题。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my efforts to bribe a maid to end the life of young [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意了我收买侍女来终结小[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]生命的计划。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] tells me that the short life of young [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will soon come to an end. A maid close to the child has been bought, and will be solving our mutual problem.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我小[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]短暂的生命将不久结束。我们收买了一位贴身侍女，她会解决我们共同的问题。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was smothered with a pillow by the maid we had bribed! Unfortunately, the maid was caught and revealed my complicity in this matter before she hanged.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经被我们所买通的那个侍女用枕头给闷死了！不幸的是，那个侍女在被吊死前供出了我的名字。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was smothered with a pillow by the maid we had bribed! She wasn't caught, and no one has any reason to place blame on me.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经被我们所买通的那个侍女用枕头给闷死了！她没被抓到，所以没人可以把这推到我的头上来。

original: This world is too cruel for children.
translation: 这个世界对儿童太残忍了。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] frightened off the maid with [From.GetHerHis] wailing, but she was caught and exposed my involvement.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]用[From.GetHerHis]尖叫吓跑了侍女，而且她还被抓住了并供出了我。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] frightened off the maid with [From.GetHerHis] wailing, but at least she made a clean escape and no one suspects my involvement.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]用[From.GetHerHis]尖叫吓跑了侍女，好在她跑的很干净利落，没人能怀疑到我。

original: The fact that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is in prison can work to our advantage. If we can get someone on the inside to kill [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] and make it look like a failed escape attempt...
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]身陷囹圄这个情况对我们有利。或许我们能搞定里面的谁把[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]给杀了，然后造成一个越狱失败的假象……

original: My co-conspirators will find the man needed...
translation: 我的同谋会找到所需要的人……

original: I know just the man for this...
translation: 我正好知道有个人适合干这事……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has requested funds to arrange for [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] to die tragically in a botched escape attempt from the prison [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is in.
translation: 我的同谋[From.GetTitledName]请求我的帮忙，以安排[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]悲剧地死于一次[Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]的牢里的越狱事件。

original: Yes, prison can be very dangerous to your health.
translation: 嗯，监狱的确很容易使人身体变坏呢。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has given me the funds I sought to place a man on the inside of the prison where [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is jailed.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给我了所需要的钱用以安插一个人进入[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]所在的监狱。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused me the money I needed to place a man on the inside of the prison where [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is jailed.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝给我安插一个人进入[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]所在的监狱所需要的钱。

original: While languishing in my prison cell, a new prisoner approached me with a plan to escape this forsaken hellhole. Concealed amongst the many tattoos on his back is a crude map of the entire dungeon!
translation: 在牢中度日如年之时，一个新狱友走到了我面前，带给了我一个逃出这个被人遗忘的地穴的方案。藏在他背上纹身里的是一张整个地牢的简图！

original: We can use this to escape!
translation: 我们能利用这个逃出去！

original: Wait a second... that's not a real tattoo!
Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to perish in a botched escape attempt next month.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]将在一个月后，由于越狱失败，而「不幸」身亡。

original: Using the map, we enter a hidden passageway behind the cells. Working our way to the dungeon's outer walls, we climb carefully on the parapet to avoid sentries. Suddenly, the cold hand of treachery makes itself felt as my "friend" pulls hard on my ankle and I lose my grip...
translation: 借助这地图，我们进入了一条牢房背后的暗道。我们小心翼翼地在护栏上攀爬着，避开那些守卫，向外墙接近。突然，一双冰冷的手用力地拉住了我的脚踝，我失去了平衡……

original: Who sent you to kill me?!

The map is not a tattoo - it been carefully painted onto the prisoner's back. When confronted, he grudgingly admits that he was paid to help me escape while making certain I suffer a fatal accident in the attempt...
translation: 这地图不是纹身——它是被人小心地画在这个囚犯背上的。在我的质问下，他无奈地承认了他是被收买来让我因越狱失败而「不幸」身亡的……

original: So [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] put you up to this.

The map is not a tattoo - it been carefully painted onto the prisoner's back. When confronted, he grudgingly admits that he was paid to help me escape while making certain I suffer a fatal accident in the attempt. He claims he never saw the face or learned the name of the person who hired him.
translation: 这地图不是纹身——它是被人小心地画在这个囚犯背上的。在我的质问下，他无奈地承认了他是被收买来让我因越狱失败而「不幸」身亡的。他声称没见过雇主的脸也不知道雇主的名字。

original: You expect me to believe that?

[From.GetTitledFirstName], my co-conspirator, tells me that a man is now on the inside of the prison where [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] sits. He will arrange an escape attempt in which one of the prisoners will sadly suffer a tragic and very fatal accident...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]——我的同谋，通知我说[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]很快就要因为越狱失败而「不幸」身亡了……

original: No one will expect foul play on our part.
translation: 没人预料到是我们的勾当。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my plan to arrange for [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] to perish in a botched prison escape attempt.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意了我安排[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]死于一次失败的越狱的计划。

original: I have been told by [From.GetTitledFirstName] that the days of [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] are numbered. A man on the inside of the prison where [From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is will arrange a prison break that will sadly result in a fatality.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我说[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]已经时日无多了。一个在[From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]所在的监狱里的人将会策划一次致命的失败越狱。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was killed while attempting to escape from prison! Unfortunately, the man on the inside who made this happen mentioned my name when he was captured...
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在越狱时被杀！糟糕的是，那个实施这次越狱的家伙被抓住后提到了我的名字……

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was killed while attempting to escape from prison! No fingers will be pointed my way.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在越狱时被杀！没人会把这算到我的头上。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to take the bait and attempt an escape. My role in this plot was inadvertently revealed by our man on the inside...
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝参与这次越狱。我在这次阴谋中的角色被我们安插在里面的那个人给透露了……

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to take the bait and attempt an escape. At least no one suspects my role in this.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝参与这次越狱。好在没有人怀疑到我。

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] may be a drooling, incapable mess, but [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is still very much alive. Every month servants give [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] a sorely needed bath, during which so many things could go wrong... especially if those servants were in our employ.
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]是个只会流口水的废人，但是[Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]依然活得好好的。每个月仆人们都要给[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]洗一次非常必要的澡，这中间就有很多文章可做了……特别是那些仆人被我们所雇佣的时候。

original: My co-conspirators will talk to the servants...
translation: 我的同谋会和那些仆人们谈谈的……

original: Arrange for the servants to be replaced with your own.
translation: 把那些仆人换成自己人。

original: I have received a request from my co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], to provide funds necessary to bribe the servants giving [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] monthly bath. If paid, they will arrange for a tragic accident...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，请求我提供一些必要的资金以收买仆人好给[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]洗一次[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]每月例行的澡。如果钱使到位，他们将安排一场悲剧性的事故……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has provided, and now I have the funds needed to bribe the servants giving [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] monthly bath.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]掏钱了，现在我有足够的资金来收买仆人们给[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]洗一次[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]每月例行的澡了。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to provide the funds needed to bribe the servants giving [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] monthly bath.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝提供收买给[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]进行[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]每月例行洗澡的仆人所需要的资金。

original: The stench of the drooling, incapable mass that is your body troubles even you, and to the delight of everyone around, the time of your monthly bath has finally arrived. Servants lower you into your bathtub and begin the long, arduous process of scrubbing away your filth...
translation: 恶臭的，流着口水的，全身不遂的身体甚至让你自己都厌恶。令你周围每个人都欣喜的是，每月一次的例行洗澡时间终于到来了。仆人们将你放入浴缸，然后开始漫长而艰巨的擦洗污垢的过程……
等——等等…… 这——这些仆人看着眼生……

original: Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to be drowned during [This.GetHerHis] monthly bath.

The servants suddenly push your head under the surface and hold you down. You flail your arms about desperately with what little motor function you still possess, but it is to no avail. As the water rushes into your lungs and your life fades away, you regret lost opportunities, harsh words to loved ones and most importantly: relieving yourself in the bathtub.
translation: 仆人们突然将你的头按入水中并一直不松开。你用尽自己仅有的力量绝望地挥动手臂，但完全起不到任何作用。水冲入了你的肺部，你的生机正在消散，你后悔错失了很多机会，对所爱的人口出恶言，以及最重要的：在浴缸中放松了自己。

original: The servants suddenly try to push your head below the water! You muster what little energy you have and trash about wildly, causing enough of a ruckus to attract the attention of a guard. The servants are detained and reveal under torture who bribed them to end your life.
translation: 仆人们突然将你的头按入水中！你集中全身仅有的力气疯狂地敲打，制造了足够的骚乱声，吸引了卫兵的注意。仆人们被扣押了，上了刑后，吐露了是谁收买了他们来终结你的生命。

original: The servants suddenly try to push your head below the water! You muster what little energy you have and trash about wildly, causing enough of a ruckus to attract the attention of a guard. The servants flee before they can be caught.
translation: 侍从们忽然把你的头按到水里！你聚集起全身每一小点力量猛烈挣扎，制造了足以引起卫兵注意的动静。侍从们逃走了。

original: Who bribed them to kill me?

The servants who will give [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] monthly bath have been bribed by my co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName]. They will see to it that this bath is [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] last...
translation: 负责给[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName][Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]洗澡的的仆人已被我的同谋[From.GetTitledFirstName]所收买。他们会让这次洗浴成为[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]最后一次的沐浴……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] lends his full support behind my initiative to bribe the servants giving [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bath.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在幕后全力支持我收买给[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]洗澡的仆人的计划。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] sends word that the servants giving the incapable [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bath have been bribed and will see to it that it is [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] last.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]传信来说给愚蠢的[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName][From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]洗澡的仆人已经被收买，并且会让这次洗浴成为[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]最后一次沐浴。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was drowned in [From.GetHerHis] bathtub! Unfortunately, the servants we bribed for the deed revealed my complicity under torture.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis]浴缸中淹死了！不幸的是，我们收买的仆人在刑讯下把我吐了出来。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was drowned in [From.GetHerHis] bathtub! No one suspects the conspiracy behind this deed.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis]浴缸中淹死了！没有人会怀疑到幕后黑手身上。

original: Yet another argument against taking baths.
translation: 又一个反对洗澡的论据。

original: Failure! Even incapable, [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to ward off the clumsy attempts of the servants to drown [From.GetHerHim]. The servants revealed my name under torture.
translation: 失败了！就算是无能，[From.GetTitledFirstName]也成功地挫败了那些仆人拙劣的溺死[From.GetHerHim]的企图。大刑之下，仆人抖露出了我的名字。

original: Failure! Even incapable, [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to ward off the clumsy attempts of the servants to drown [From.GetHerHim]. At least they had the good sense to avoid getting caught.
translation: 失败了！就算是无能，[From.GetTitledFirstName]也成功地挫败了那些仆人拙劣的溺死[From.GetHerHim]的企图。好在他们至少还有足够的意识躲开抓捕。

original: Muslims do not receive or lose prestige for marriages
translation: 穆斯林的婚姻不会增减威望

original: Go to diplomacy\nRight-click to open Submenu
translation: 前往外交界面\n右击打开子菜单

original: Go to character\nRight-click to open Submenu
translation: 前往角色界面\n右击打开子菜单

original: Whispers have reached my ears that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is due to embark on a little boat trip. I have it on good authority that [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe], like many children, has not yet learned to swim. If the boat was to flounder... well, these things happen all the time, don't they?
translation: 传言说[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]将要坐小船去旅行。我有可靠的消息说[Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]，跟很多儿童一样，没学过游泳。如果船翻了……哈，这种事情一直在发生，不是么？

original: My co-conspirators will find some good men...
translation: 我的同谋会找到合适的人选……

original: Hire men to sabotage the boat
translation: 雇几个人去破坏那艘船

original: I know just the men for this job...
translation: 我正好知道都有谁适合干这活……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], is requesting funds to hire a few carpenters who will sabotage a boat that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is soon to take a trip onboard. The child does not know how to swim...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，请求资助以雇佣几个木匠破坏那艘[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]不久将用来出行的船。那孩子不知道怎么游泳……

original: Send the money... and I really must learn how to swim some day.
translation: 给钱……我也得找个时间去学下游泳。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me the money I asked for to hire carpenters. They will prepare the boat before [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] boards it.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给了我雇佣木匠的钱。他们会在[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]上船之前对船做些手脚。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] will not give me the necessary coin to hire carpenters. They were needed to prepare the boat before [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] boards it.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不给我雇佣木匠所需要的钱。可我们需要他们在[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]上船前对船做手脚。

original: It is a beautiful day as you make your way down to the local harbor with a handful of servants. You will be going on a short boat trip today, something that has you very excited. The vessel awaits at the dock, ready to take you on.
translation: 是日也，天朗气清，惠风和畅，你带着一群仆人走向本地的港口。今天你将要扬帆启航，去进行一段短途旅行，这让你非常兴奋。船停在码头等候着你的驾临。

original: This is going to be great!
translation: 我可以肯定，这将是次完美的旅行！

original: Sabotage the boat [This.GetTitledFirstName] is due to travel on.

The little boat sails off and you spend some time alone by the railing, staring down into the deep, murky water. Suddenly there is shouting behind you and the boat flounders, sending you into the cold water! You desperately try to stay afloat, but without knowing how to swim, you soon sink beneath the waves...
translation: 小船启航了，你独自靠着栏杆，看向深邃混浊的海水深处。突然背后传来一声惊叫，船顿时就翻了，你掉入了冰冷的海水中！你绝望地挣扎着想浮上去，但是却不懂怎么游泳，不久便又沉入到波涛之下……

original: Upon closer inspection at your request, the sailors find that the boat has been tampered with! Had it set sail, it would surely have floundered, taking you with it below the waves.
translation: 在你的要求下经过了仔细的检查，水手们发现这艘船被做了手脚！如果用它出航的话，无疑会让所有人都葬身鱼腹。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had his men sabotage the boat!
translation: 肯定是[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]派人破坏了这艘船！

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has let me know that everything has been prepared for a little boating accident [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is soon to be the victim of.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，告诉我一切准备就绪，[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]不久将在海难中遇难。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] sends [From.GetHerHis] approval for the sabotage of the boat that will carry [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] to [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] watery grave. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉[From.GetHerHis]赞成破坏那艘将把[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName][From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]埋葬水底的船只。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]宽恕我！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has informed me that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is moving forward according to plan. A month from now [From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] will be lost forever in an unfortunate boating accident...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]通知我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋进展顺利。一个月内[From.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]将在一次不幸的海难中永远地失踪……

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] sank like a stone when the boat [From.GetSheHe] was on suffered an unfortunate "accident"! Sadly, it has become obvious the boat suffered sabotage, and all the evidence leads back to me...
translation: 成功了！在[From.GetSheHe]船遭遇到一次不幸的「事故」时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]跟块石头一样沉了下去！不幸的是，这船被破坏的迹象太明显了，并且所有的证据都指向了我……

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] sank like a stone when the boat [From.GetSheHe] was on suffered an unfortunate "accident"! All evidence of my complicity went down with the ship!
translation: 成功了！在[From.GetSheHe]船遭遇到一次不幸的「事故」时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]跟块石头一样沉了下去！所有的证据都随着那艘船沉入了海底！

original: Failure! Somehow [From.GetTitledFirstName] discovered the sabotage and the boat never left port. That meddlesome child has linked the evidence back to me...
translation: 失败了！因为某些原因[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现了那些手脚，这艘船不会出港了。那个多事的小孩还把证据联系到了我身上……
原本这应该是没问题的啊……

original: Failure! Somehow [From.GetTitledFirstName] discovered the sabotage and the boat never left port. At least the foolish child has no reason to suspect my involvement.
translation: 失败了！不知为何[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现了那些手脚，这艘船不会出港了。还好那个蠢货没有理由怀疑到我。

original: There are snakes out there who can fell a grown man instantly with a single bite. If such a one was to visit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] in [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bedchambers at night...
translation: 有些蛇，只需要一口，便能送一个大人离开这个世界。如果这样的一条能在晚上到[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]卧室里拜访下[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]……

original: My co-conspirators will procure the snake...
translation: 我的同谋会找到这样一条蛇……

original: I know where to get this snake...
translation: 我知道在哪能得到这样一条蛇……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has asked for coin to buy a rare and extremely lethal snake. If purchased, it will pay [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] a little nightly visit.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，要求我给一些钱去买一条稀有的极其致命的毒蛇。如果买了，它将给[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]做一次小小的夜访。

original: Give [From.GetHerHim] the money. That serpent could be the answer to our prayers.
translation: 掏钱给[From.GetHerHim]。那条蛇就是对我们的祈祷的答复。

original: I have received the money from [From.GetTitledFirstName] to buy the snake. I will soon be introducing it to [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 我收到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]给我的买蛇钱。我会很快把蛇介绍给[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] says [From.GetSheHe] will not be sending the coin I need to procure this rare snake!

It has been a long day and it is with some relief that you retreat to your bedchamber for the night. Your bed is warm and just as you are about to drift off into sleep, you hear a strange hissing sound...
translation: 漫长的一天过去了现在是休息的时间，你回到了自己的卧室度过这个夜晚。被窝很温暖，正当你要入睡时，你听到一声奇怪的嘶嘶声……

original: A carpenter will need to look at this bed tomorrow.
translation: 明天要找个木匠来加固下这张床。

original: Unleash a poisonous snake on [This.GetTitledFirstName] next month.

Something cold and scaly brushes past your naked leg, and as you sit up, you feel a sharp pain in your upper thigh. Pulling back the covers reveals a vicious, hissing snake! You stumble out of bed, but already your sight grows dimmer as the intense pain spreads throughout your body...
translation: 一个冰冷的东西顺着你的腿慢慢地向上爬着，那些鳞片让你的腿上出了无数的鸡皮疙瘩。当你坐起来时，你感觉你的大腿被什么东西狠狠地咬了一口。你猛地揭开床单，一只阴冷的正吐着信子的蛇赫然出现在了你的面前！你蹒跚地跑下了床，但是你的视线已渐渐模糊，剧痛正在你全身蔓延……

original: You immediately roll out of bed before the vile serpent has a chance to strike. The beast recoils and disappears beneath the covers as you run out to fetch the guard.
translation: 你立刻滚下了床，那条恶心的毒蛇还没来得及出击。在你跑出去叫卫兵的时候这畜生从被子底下跑了。

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has procured a poisonous viper, and sends word that it will soon dig its fangs into [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，已经找到了一条剧毒的蛇，发消息给我说它不久就能把毒牙嵌进[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的肉里。

original: Just don't point that thing at me.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is delighted to learn that [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is soon to be the victim of a savage snake attack. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]得知[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]不久将成为毒蛇袭击的受害者时非常开心。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]原谅我！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. Within a month an extremely poisonous snake will be slipped into [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bedchambers.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的阴谋进展顺利。一个月内一条剧毒的蛇将溜进[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]卧室。

original: Success! The snake performed its duty with aplomb and pumped [From.GetTitledFirstName] full of its deadly venom. Unfortunately, the serpent was caught and the seller has revealed my complicity.
translation: 成功了！这条蛇沉着地完成了任务，对[From.GetTitledFirstName]释放了它所有的毒液。不幸的是，蛇被抓住了，出售的人供出了我。

original: Success! The snake performed its duty with aplomb and pumped [From.GetTitledFirstName] full of its deadly venom. It slipped away into the night, and the guards are now too busy contending with a string of lethal snake attacks to search for those responsible.
translation: 成功了！这条蛇沉着地完成了任务，对[From.GetTitledFirstName]释放了它所有的毒液，然后趁着夜色溜之大吉。现在卫兵们正忙着就毒蛇袭击蛛丝马迹进行争论都没时间来找真正需要负责的人。

original: I could kiss that snake! Well, maybe not...
translation: 我简直想吻一下那条蛇！好吧，还是别了……

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to evade the snake, and the guards caught the serpent as it tried to slither away. The seller was identified and has revealed my complicity...
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]成功地躲开了那条蛇。在毒蛇想要溜走的时候卫兵抓住了它。出售这条蛇的商人被找出来了，我的同谋也被发现了……

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to evade the snake which slipped away into the darkness. A massive snake-hunt is now underway, but at least no one suspects my involvement.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]成功地躲开了那条蛇，它随后在夜色中溜走了。现在正在声势浩大地搜寻那条蛇，但还好没人怀疑到我身上。

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] likes to take in the morning air on [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] balcony. The fall would be a long one indeed if someone was to take a tumble from there... perhaps the railing could be "adjusted" slightly.
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]喜欢在[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]阳台上吸几口早晨的新鲜空气。如果有人从那摔下去的话，应该能飞好长一会吧……或许那栏杆可以稍稍「调整」一下。

original: My co-conspirators will find someone who can get this done...
translation: 我的同谋会找到人选来搞定这事……

original: I know someone who can get this done...
translation: 我知道谁能办妥这件事……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], is asking for funds to hire a specialist who will weaken the railing on a balcony that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is known to frequent. The fall will be a long one...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，请求资助，以雇佣专业人士来弄脆[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]常去的阳台上的栏杆。 摔下去能飞好长一会……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent the funds I needed. I can now hire a specialist to weaken the balcony's railing.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]把我需要的钱给了我。我现在可以雇佣一个专家来弄脆阳台上的护栏了。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to provide the funds needed for hiring a specialist to weaken the balcony's railing.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝提供雇佣专家弄脆阳台栏杆所需的资金。

original: Every morning, especially when the weather is as splendid as it is today, you like to go out on your balcony, lean against the railing and take in a deep breath of fresh air. The view from up here is spectacular.
translation: 每个早晨，特别是像今天这样好天气的，你的喜欢到你的阳台上，靠在栏杆上做一次深呼吸，享受新鲜空气。从上面看下去的视野也很壮观。

original: The people below look like ants!
translation: 下面的人看着就像蚂蚁！

original: Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to fall from [This.GetHerHis] balcony.

As you lean forward on the railing, you suddenly hear the sound of splintering wood as it gives way completely and you tumble over the edge. While plummeting towards the ground, you spend your last moments reflecting on the gravity of the situation.
translation: 正当你靠着栏杆探出去的时候，你突然听到了一个木头裂开的声音。木头断得很彻底，你从边缘翻了出去。你直直地冲着地面掉落，用生命的最后时光认识了引力……

original: I will haunt the carpenter who built that railing...
translation: 我做鬼也要缠着做了那个栏杆的木匠……

original: You inspect the railing only to discover that someone has sawed through its supports! The slightest nudge would have been enough to make the whole thing topple over the side. Had you leaned against it as usual...
translation: 你检查了栏杆发现有人锯断了它的支撑点！再小的接触都有可能让整个东西翻个面。倘若你像往常一样靠上去……

original: Who would have done such a thing... and why?
translation: 谁会做这样的事呢……为什么要这么做？

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has hired someone to saw through the supports of the railing on a balcony [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is known to frequent. Someone may soon take a bit of a tumble...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，雇人把[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]常去的阳台上的栏杆的支撑部给锯断了。某人不久要翻个小筋斗了……

original: [From.GetTitledName] approves of my idea to send [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] flying off a balcony. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]同意了我让[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]从阳台上飞下去的主意。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]原谅我！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. The supports of the railing on a balcony [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is known to frequent have been critically weakened.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的阴谋进展顺利。[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]常去的阳台的栏杆已经被严重削弱了。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] fell to the ground like a piece of rotten fruit when the balcony railing gave way. Unfortunately, the carpenter who weakened it had second thoughts and revealed my involvement.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在阳台栏杆断裂的时候摔了下去，砸在地上就跟个烂水果一样。不幸的是，弄脆栏杆的木匠有二心，把我的事情说了出去。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] fell to the ground like a piece of rotten fruit when the balcony railing gave way. A tragic accident, as far as anyone is concerned.
translation: 成功了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]在阳台栏杆断裂的时候摔了下去，砸在地上就跟个烂水果一样。所有人都认为这是一个悲剧。

original: Gravity can be a cruel mistress.
Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] discovered the sabotage that had been done on the railing. The carpenter we used was detained and revealed my involvement under torture...
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现了栏杆被破坏过。我们使用的木匠被抓了起来，刑讯之后吐出了我的名字……

original: I can't be blamed for building code violations...
translation: 又不是我违反的建筑条例！你们不能怪我……

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] discovered the sabotage that had been done on the railing. At least [From.GetSheHe] is clueless as to who deserves the blame for this.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现了栏杆被破坏过。好在至少[From.GetSheHe]没有找到谁该为此负责的线索。
