original: Young [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will soon be going on a hunting trip to learn about the majesty of the wilds. With hounds and other dangerous beasts running around, not to mention arrows flying in every direction, so many things could go wrong during a hunt...
translation: 小[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]不久要去打猎，感受下野外的风情。打猎时可以发生很多意外，身边有猎狗和其他猛兽，更不用说乱飞的箭头了……

original: My co-conspirators will bribe a hunter...
translation: 我的同谋会收买一个猎手……

original: I have some leverage on one of the hunters...
translation: 我对某个猎手有些影响……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has requested funds to bribe one of the hunters taking young [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] on a hunting trip. An accident will be arranged...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，请求资助以收买打猎时和[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]同行的一个猎手。我们将安排一场意外……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has given me the gold I needed to bribe one of the hunters going out with [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给了我收买与[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]同行的猎手所需要的钱。

original: For some reason [From.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to provide the gold needed to bribe one of the hunters going out with [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 出于某种原因[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝提供收买[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]同行猎手所需的资金。

original: You are very excited to be going on your first hunting trip! A skilled hunter will be taking you under his wing and teaching you how to hunt and survive in the wilds. The next couple of days will be one big adventure!
translation: 你对你的头次狩猎感到十分的激动！一个老猎人将带着你征服旷野。你将要在他的教导下学习如何在荒野生存。接下来的几天将会是一场刺激的冒险！

original: Why is that hunter so nervous?
translation: 那个猎人为啥这么紧张？

original: Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to perish in a hunting accident.

The hunter tracks a rabbit and gives you the first shot. As quietly as possible, you draw your bow, take aim and send an arrow into the small animal's flank. Filled with pride you turn around, only to see the hunter aiming his own bow at you, fully drawn. "I am sorry," he whispers before sending the arrow into your throat.
translation: 猎人发现了一只兔子并让你射第一箭。你尽可能安静地拉开了你的弓，瞄准，将箭射入了这小动物的侧身。带着满满的自豪，你转过身来，却只看到那猎人用他的弓瞄准着你，拉满了弓。「抱歉」，他低声说道，然后把箭射入了你的咽喉。

original: As the hunter's behavior becomes increasingly nervous and erratic you decide to confront him about it. Weeping he admits to having been paid a handsome sum to kill you during the hunt and make it look like an accident.
translation: 那猎人表现得越来越紧张，错误百出，你决定正面质询下他。他抽泣着承认了自己被高价收买，让你死于狩猎并让这一切看上去像个意外。

original: And you say you never saw the face of your employer?
translation: 你说你从没见过雇主的脸？

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has bribed a hunter taking [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] on a trip into the wilds to quietly dispatch the child and make it look like an accident.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，收买了一个猎人，让他带[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]去野外狩猎并悄悄地解决掉这个孩子，然后让这一切看着像个意外。

original: They call it the wilds for a reason.
translation: 这就是为什么人们称野外为野外。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is pleased to learn that [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will soon meet [From.GetHerHis] end in the wilds. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]开心地得知[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]不久将在野外遇到[From.GetHerHis]末日。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]原谅我！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. A hunter taking the [From.PlotTarget.GetLadLass] on a trip to the wilds has been generously bribed to cause a tragic hunting accident.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的阴谋进展顺利。一个带[From.PlotTarget.GetLadLass]去野外狩猎的猎人已被收买，将制造一起悲剧的狩猎事故。

original: Success! The hunter did what he was paid for and made sure [From.GetTitledFirstName] never returned from the hunting trip. Unfortunately, he later lost his nerve and told everyone willing to listen about my involvement as he drank away his sorrows.
translation: 成功了！那个猎人不辱使命让[From.GetTitledFirstName]再也不能从这次狩猎执行中归来了。不幸的是，他后来失去了谨慎，喝了几杯后就把我的事情说的人人皆知。

original: Success! The hunter did what he was paid for and made sure [From.GetTitledFirstName] never returned from the hunting trip. He will keep quiet about his ghastly deed to save his own skin if nothing else.
translation: 成功了！那个猎人不辱使命让[From.GetTitledFirstName]再也不能从这次狩猎执行中归来了。为了自己着想他也会严守秘密保持沉默。

original: To hunt a man is truly the greatest sport...
translation: 猎杀一个人真是最伟大的运动……

original: Failure! That fool hunter lost his nerve and refused to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]! What is more, he told the [From.PlotTarget.GetLadLass] everything about the conspiracy - including my involvement!
translation: 失败了！那个猎人发了神经，拒绝刺杀[From.GetTitledFirstName]！更过分的是，他还告诉了[From.PlotTarget.GetLadLass]整个阴谋的一切细节——包括我的名字！

original: I knew we couldn't trust him!
translation: 我就知道我们不能相信他！

original: Failure! That fool hunter lost his nerve and refused to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]! At least he has decided to keep quiet about the conspiracy to hide the shame of his own involvement.
translation: 失败了！那个蠢货猎人临阵变卦拒绝刺杀[From.GetTitledFirstName]！好在他决定保守秘密以保持自己声誉。

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will soon travel by carriage on an isolated road. Perhaps if we gathered some mercenaries and disguised them as highwaymen... crime is on the rise, after all.
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]不久将坐着马车经过一条僻静小路。或许我们能召集一些佣兵假扮成劫匪……毕竟犯罪率正在上升。

original: My co-conspirators will hire the mercenaries...
I know the men for this job...
translation: 我知道那些适合干这事的人……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has asked for gold to hire some mercenaries. They will ambush [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] disguised as highwaymen.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，请求给些钱用以雇佣佣兵。他们会装成劫匪伏击[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]。

original: Excellent idea! The gold is yours.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted me the gold I asked for to hire mercenaries.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] will not be providing the gold I need to hire the mercenaries.

You are travelling by carriage in the countryside of [Root.Location.GetName] when it comes to a sudden halt. The road has been blocked by a fallen tree, and the coachman explains that you will have to make a slight detour on an isolated smaller path.
translation: 你坐着马车在[Root.Location.GetName]的郊外经过，突然车停了下来。路被一颗翻倒的树挡住了。车夫说你们不得不绕道从一条僻静的小路上过了。

original: Very well, but this had better not delay us!
translation: 好吧，但是最好别耽误时间！

original: No, you fool! It's a trap!
translation: 不，你个白痴！这是个圈套！

original: Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to die in a roadside ambush.

After less than half a league on the small path, you are ambushed and surrounded by highwaymen! They send your driver on his way, explaining that their interest lies with you alone. You offer the belongings you carry with you, but they merely laugh at this - it is your blood they want.
translation: 在小路上走了不到半里格，你中了埋伏，被劫匪包围了！他们放走了你的车夫，说他们只对你感兴趣。你把身上所有的财物都给他们，但他们只是致以嘲笑——你的血才是他们想要的。

original: I see. Disguised mercenaries working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 我明白了。伪装了的佣兵替[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]卖命……
你——你们不是单纯的劫匪！

original: You force your way through the improvised barricade, narrowly avoiding an ambush by highwaymen! They send an accurate volley of arrows after your carriage as it speeds away, missing it by mere inches.
translation: 你强行从路障中将马车推了过去，堪堪避开了劫匪的伏击！当你的车扬长而去时，他们射出了一阵精准的箭雨，箭头擦身而过。

original: Only mercenaries in the employ of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] are so precise...
translation: 只有被[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]雇佣的佣兵才能如此精准……

original: Too accurate for highwaymen. Only mercenaries are so precise...
translation: 对劫匪来说太准了。只有佣兵才能这么精准……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has assembled a party of mercenaries who will ambush [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] disguised as highwaymen. I am assured [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] will not survive the encounter.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，召集了一队佣兵，将假扮成劫匪伏击[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]。他对我保证说[Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]不会活下来。

original: Yes, the roads just aren't safe anymore...
translation: 是啊，路上再也不太平了呢……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has communicated [From.GetHerHis] support for my plan to ambush [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] with mercenaries disguised as highwaymen. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对我让佣兵假扮劫匪伏击[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]的方案表示了[From.GetHerHis]支持。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]原谅我！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. A party of mercenaries in [From.GetHerHis] employ will ambush [From.PlotTarget.GetFirstName] disguised as mercenaries within a month.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的阴谋进展顺利。一队给[From.GetHerHis]卖命的佣兵将在月内扮成劫匪伏击[From.PlotTarget.GetFirstName]。

original: Success! The mercenaries ambushed the carriage of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and made short work of [From.GetHerHim]. Unfortunately, the driver survived and saw through their disguises. My involvement is now public knowledge...
translation: 成功了！佣兵伏击了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的马车结果了[From.GetHerHim]。糟糕的是，幸存的车夫看穿了他们的伪装。我的阴谋现在世人皆知了……

original: Success! The mercenaries ambushed the carriage of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and made short work of [From.GetHerHim]. They let the driver go, and he is convinced the attack was carried out by highwaymen.
translation: 成功了！佣兵伏击了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的马车结果了[From.GetHerHim]。他们放走了车夫，他相信了袭击是劫匪造成的。

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] got away from the ambush, and [From.GetSheHe] saw through the disguises of the mercenaries, identifying them as men in my employ!
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]从伏击中脱身了，并且[From.GetSheHe]看穿了佣兵们的伪装，认为他们是我雇佣的！

original: The plan looked good on paper...
translation: 这计划纸面上看起来还行啊……

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] got away from the ambush, but at least the disguises of the mercenaries held up, concealing my involvement.
translation: 失败了！[From.GetTitledFirstName]从伏击中脱身了，不过还好佣兵们的伪装帮上了忙，我的事情没被发现。

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will soon embark on a lengthy journey by carriage, during which so many things could go wrong. If we could buy the loyalty of the carriage driver...
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]不久将坐车进行一次长途旅行，这中间有太多文章可做了。或许我们可以收买车夫……

original: My co-conspirators will bribe the driver...
translation: 我的同谋会收买那车夫……

original: I know how to persuade the driver...
translation: 我知道怎样说服那车夫……

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], wants money to bribe the driver of the carriage taking [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] on a lengthy journey. An accident will be arranged along the way...
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，需要钱来收买[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]长途旅行那车的车夫。路上将有事故发生……

original: I have received the money from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It is enough to bribe the driver!
translation: 我收到[From.GetTitledFirstName]的钱。足够收买那车夫了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided not to send me the money I needed to bribe the carriage driver...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]决定不给我收买车夫所需要的钱……

original: You are going on a lengthy journey by closed carriage in [Root.Location.GetName] together with some of your trusted bodyguards. As you travel down a steep slope overlooking a ravine, you notice that you have begun to pick up quite a bit of speed.
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]和几个值得信赖的护卫一起坐车去长途旅行。在经过一个悬崖上的陡坡时，你突然发现车速有点过快。

original: Excellent, we shall make good time.
translation: 很好，这样可以省点时间。

original: Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] perish in a carriage accident.

The speed of the carriage picks up even more as it hurtles down the slope. Looking through the rear window you see a waving man holding the reins of two familiar-looking horses far behind on the road. Only when the carriage flies over the edge of the ravine do you realize who it was the man reminded you of - your driver...
translation: 车速更快了在坡上狂飙。从尾窗看出去你看到路后面的远处有一个牵着两匹很眼熟的马的家伙正在朝你挥手。直到车厢从山坡上飞了出去你才意识到那个人是——你的车夫……

original: You and your guards throw yourself out of the carriage before it flies over the edge of the ravine. Far behind is your fleeing driver with the horses, but your guards catch up with and detain the man. He admits to having been paid generously to see you suffer a fatal accident during the journey.
translation: 在车厢飞出山道之前你和卫兵们把你扔了出来。后方远处是你带着马逃跑的车夫，但是你的卫兵还是追上去抓住了他。他承认自己被高价收买，只为了让你在旅途中遭遇一次致命的事故。

original: And you don't know by whom? You will hang for this.
translation: 然后你居然不知道谁给的钱？你会被吊死。

original: My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has sent word that the carriage [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is travelling on will soon suffer an unfortunate accident leaving no survivors.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，捎了口信给我说[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]出行坐的车不久将遭遇一次不幸的事故，无人能幸存。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my scheme to have [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] perish in an unfortunate carriage accident. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意了我让[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]死于车祸的计划。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]宽恕我！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. A tragic carriage accident will claim [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] life a month from now...
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的阴谋进展顺利。一个月内一次悲剧性的车祸将带走[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]生命……

original: Success! The carriage was sent flying over the edge of a cliff with [From.GetTitledFirstName] still in it. Unfortunately, the driver I bribed was caught and my involvement was revealed during his torture...
translation: 成功了！车厢从悬崖上飞了出去，里面还载着[From.GetTitledFirstName]。糟糕的是，我收买的车夫被抓住了，在刑讯逼供之下透露了我也参与其中的事……

original: Success! The carriage was sent flying over the edge of a cliff with [From.GetTitledFirstName] still in it. The driver I bribed has also been dealt with, leaving no loose ends that can tie me to this event.
translation: 成功了！车厢从悬崖上飞了出去，里面还载着[From.GetTitledFirstName]。我收买的车夫也被处理了，没留下任何能把我和这件事联系起来的东西。

original: Shame on such a nice carriage, though.
Failure! The carriage was sent flying into a ravine, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] jumped out moments earlier. The driver was caught and has revealed my complicity in this plot.
translation: 失败了！车厢飞入了山谷，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]及时跳了出来。车夫被抓住了，还供出了我。

original: Failure! The carriage was sent flying into a ravine, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] jumped out moments earlier. At least the driver was killed by [From.GetHerHis] guards before my involvement could be exposed.
translation: 失败了！车厢飞入了山谷，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]及时跳了出来。还好在抖露我的事情之前车夫被[From.GetHerHis]护卫杀了。

original: You have become the ruler of a Theocracy and are therefore no longer allowed to continue playing.
translation: 你成了一个神权国的统治者，因此不允许继续游戏。

original: You have become the ruler of a Republic and are therefore no longer allowed to continue playing.
translation: 你成了共和国的统治者，因此不允许继续游戏。

original: You have become a Muslim and are therefore no longer allowed to continue playing.
translation: 你成了穆斯林，因此不允许继续游戏。

original: Expose the courtier as not Christian enough
translation: 揭发廷臣对基督的不诚

original: I want that job, and I want it bad! There's no way [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will give it to me just because I want to become a councillor, I need to work hard to get it.
translation: 我想要那个职位，我迫不及待了！[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]不会仅仅因为我想成为内阁成员就给我这个职位，我需要努力工作来取得它。

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] plans to become friends with [This.GetTitledFirstName] to eventually gain the [This.GetJobTitle] job...
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]计划通过与[This.GetTitledFirstName]成为朋友来最终获得[This.GetJobTitle]这个职位……

original: It's no big secret [From.GetTitledFirstName] is after my job as [Root.GetJobTitle], but [From.GetSheHe] did surprise me when [From.GetSheHe] asked me outright for help. Should I really teach [From.GetTitledFirstName] the secrets of my trade only to make it easier for [From.GetHerHim] to steal my position as [Root.GetJobTitle] in [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s court?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]垂涎我的[Root.GetJobTitle]职位已经不是一个秘密，但是当[From.GetSheHe]到来[From.GetSheHe]并向我寻求帮助的时候真让我吃惊。我应该把内幕告诉给[From.GetTitledFirstName]然后让[From.GetHerHim]更轻易地从我手中偷走我的[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的[Root.GetJobTitle]职位吗？
